Articles.Content:
Hey fellow kerbals!

Ive playing career in 1.0 for a while now and never completed rescue contracts. Now i want to and i dont see them anymore...

Do you guys have an idea to get them back?

Thanks in adcance!

What do you mean, you've never done a rescue contract!? I've staffed my entire program with rescued kerbals; much cheaper than recruiting them! I even had to upgrade the astronaut complex to fit them all in.

I don't know why those contract aren't being offered. I believe some contract offerings and/or their rewards depend on reputation. Maybe you need good rep to be offered rescue contracts?

Yeah I know, pretty stupid I found out just a while ago pretty far in my carreer. 

I've good reputation, so that isn't the point.. maybe it is because I ignored them all the time? But the question is how to get them back
If you decline enough contracts, I'm sure there will be some new rescue missions available at some point. They might not be as easy as rescuing from low Kerbin orbit, but they'll be available.
